entities.name: ministry of magic
entities.description: The Ministry of Magic is mentioned as an organization that employs Broderick Bode.

entities.name: st mungo’s hospital
entities.description: St. Mungo's Hospital is where Broderick Bode was a patient and worked.

entities.name: broderick bode
entities.description: Broderick Bode is the Ministry of Magic worker who died in his bed.

entities.name: miriam strout
entities.description: Miriam Strout is a healer at St. Mungo's Hospital and was in charge of Mr. Bode’s ward.

relationships.description: St. Mungo's Hospital employed Broderick Bode as a worker.
Miriam Strout was in charge of Mr. Bode’s ward at St. Mungo's Hospital.
